page.title: 02MIXED FARMING - GILLING WEST
page.content:
On the mixed farm the farmer gets up at 7 0'clock and first goes round the fields and buildings checking his stock. He makes sure that none have been taken ill during the night and feeds them. After that he has his breakfast.
His next job is to spray his{crops with chemicals which prevent fungal diseases.For this he uses a chemical sprayer attached to his tractor.His main crop is {wheat. }He also grows {oil seed rape}for margarine and cooking oil,{potatoes}for crisps and chips,and{barley}for pig feed.
After dinner he feeds the animals _ {Large White pigs, Masham sheep}and {Friesian x Hereford cattle,}producing pork,lamb and beef_ before finishing work at 9p.m.
